Sentencas: A functioning solid oxide fuel-cell (SOFC) may require all types of seals, such as metal-metal, metal-ceramic, and ceramic-ceramic.
Titulo: High-temperature seals for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: These seals must function at high temperatures between 600 and 900 degrees C and in the oxidizing and reducing environments of fuels and air.
Titulo: High-temperature seals for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Among the different types of seals, the metal-metal seals can be readily fabricated using metal joining, soldering, and brazing techniques.
Titulo: High-temperature seals for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: However, metal-ceramic and ceramic-ceramic seals require significant research and development because the brittle nature of ceramics/glasses can lead to fracture and loss of seal integrity and functionality.
Titulo: High-temperature seals for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Consequently, any seals involving ceramics/glasses also require significant attention and technology development for reliable SOFC operation.
Titulo: High-temperature seals for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: This paper is prepared to primarily address the needs and possible approacbes for high-temperature seals for SOFC and seals fabricated using some of these approaches.
Titulo: High-temperature seals for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: A new concept of self-healing glass seals is proposed for making seals among material combinations with a significant expansion mismatches.
Titulo: High-temperature seals for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)
